body:
Why it is impossible to save current deck between matches ?
Sometimes when playing Tribal Mono i see a really interesting decks but after first match i can't save it for further playing.
author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: Enhancement

comments.body:
You can still save the deck when the duel is over (after 3/5/7/9 or 11 games), but that's not a very elegant solution as it could mean choosing 'concede game' a lot of times only to be able to save a cool deck.
I don't know why the 'save deck' menu option is disabled to be honest. The code simply disables the top four menu items in the duel menu while a duel is ongoing.

I agree it should be possible to save decks between matches so I'll enable the menu option.

Thanks for the suggestion.

**Status:** Accepted  
  **Labels:** -Type-Defect Type-Enhancement
